Reference

All functions

bl() tl() br() tr() la() ta() ra() ba()

Adjacency, for use in creating area based meshes

align_extent()

Crop an extent, snapped to the grain

cell_from_xy() cell_from_extent() extent_from_cell() rowcol_from_cell() xy_from_cell() x_from_cell() y_from_cell() col_from_cell() row_from_cell() cell_from_row() cell_from_col() cell_from_row_col() cell_from_rowcol_combine()

Cells

x_corner() y_corner() x_centre() y_centre() x_from_col() y_from_row() col_from_x() row_from_y() xy()

Coordinates

Draw extent

extent_dimension()

Dimension for an aligned extent

extent_vrt()

Extents from VRT

from_xyz()

Derive a grid from XYZ points

n_cell() x_res() y_res() n_row() n_col() xlim() ylim() x_min() x_max() y_min() y_max()

Grid

Intersect extent

origin()

Origin of grid alignment

plot_extent()

Plot an extent

snap_extent() buffer_extent()

Snap extent to resolution (buffer extent)
